Uses of Package
org.simplity.kernel.expr

  • Packages that use org.simplity.kernel.expr 
    Package Description
    org.simplity.kernel.expr
    Implementation of an expression as used in the context of computing.
    org.simplity.tp  
  • Classes in org.simplity.kernel.expr used by org.simplity.kernel.expr 
    Class and Description
    BinaryOperator
    models a binary operator that operates like operand1 Operator operand2.
    InvalidExpressionException
    Represents an exceptional condition that an operator is invalid for the value type that it is to operate on
    InvalidOperationException
    operation and value mismatch condition
    UnaryOperator
    models a unary operator that operates on a value.
  • Classes in org.simplity.kernel.expr used by org.simplity.tp 
    Class and Description
    Expression
    Expression can contain operands : numeric constant as in 0.4, 4 but not .6 and definitely not 2.3e5 text/string literal like 'abcd', "d'Souza" but not "d\"Souza" date literal like /2012-12-31/ no other format at all, no time etc..
